webscript.shortname: Add Custom Association from a source to a target RM node
webscript.description:
Adds a custom association from the source node (specified in the URL) to the target node (specified in the POST content). The body of the post should be in the form
{
   "assocTypeQName" : The short form of the association type qname e.g. "rmc:foo",
   "targetStoreType" : The store type of the target node e.g. "workspace",
   "targetStoreId" : The store id of the target node e.g. "SpacesStore",
   "targetId" : The store type of the target node e.g. "12345678-abcd-1234-abcd-123456789012",
}
